messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Dr. John Hunt, a former computer professional and now a nurse has campaigned for many years on equality issues, health and protecting our fragile environment. These are all essential for the people of Brentford and Isleworth.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure everyone is treated fairly, schools prepare pupils to integrate and adapt to our changing world, create sustainable and useful jobs, eradicate poverty, provide access to housing, and fair pensions.
Improve standards, strive for better physical and mental health and encourage healthier lifestyles for future generations.
Our air quality contravenes European standards; wildlife is disappearing; bees that pollinate crops are in decline.

mentions.candidate: Dr. John Hunt, John says, 'We have no time to lose. Vote Green! Every vote counts.'

issues.environment: Our air quality contravenes European standards; wildlife is disappearing; bees that pollinate crops are in decline.
issues.health: Improve standards, strive for better physical and mental health and encourage healthier lifestyles for future generations.

housing.content: Ensure everyone is treated fairly, provide access to housing

leaflet.personalStatement: Dr. John Hunt, a former computer professional and now a nurse has campaigned for many years on equality issues, health and protecting our fragile environment.

endorsements.endorser: Darren Johnson, Green Party member of the London Assembly

images.caption: John with Darren Johnson, Green Party member of the London Assembly.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed on 100% recycled paper using sustainable technologies that do not harm the environment.
